channel.title: Ras Orchestra on Rusland 1
channel.description: Recent content in Ras Orchestra on Rusland 1

item.title: Ras Orchestra – No Way Back (Нет пути назад)
item.description: So what. If the weather gods aren’t cooperating, the true rasta man or woman will make it sunny themselves. Jah (in Russian Джа) is great. Njet puti nazad The opening track is by Ras Orchestra (not to be confused with Rasta Orchestra ).
